data.title: Peta Murgatroyd & Maks Chmerkovskiy 3rd Baby
data.meta_description: 'Dancing with the Stars' pros Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy have announced the birth of their third baby together.
data.text:
Professional dancers Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy have added another bundle of joy to their family! The Dancing with the Stars pros have announced the birth of their third baby. â€œMom and baby are doing perfect.â€

Maks shared a quick post following the birth of the coupleâ€™s third baby, which came just a few hours after they revealed Peta was getting ready to give birth. The couple welcomed a baby boy, news they revealed in March. â€œHe is officially evicted from his mom and he is sooooo cute!!!!,â€ Maks began in the caption. He went on to give a bit of insight into Petaâ€™s birth sharing, â€œBirth details later but for now we wanted to let you all know that mom and baby are doing perfect, and delivery took around 47 seconds total! Exactly one push!â€ Earlier in the day, the couple shared a post after arriving at the hospital, writing on Instagram, â€œHere we go againâ€¦.again! Wish us luck.â€

In a follow up post, Peta shared the first image of her baby and revealed his name: Milan Maksim Chmerkovskiy. Milan arrived on July 12th at 8:48 AM and weighed 8 lbs at birth. At the end of her post, the dancer shared, â€œThe fam is complete ğŸ¥¹,â€ signifying that Milan is likely the coupleâ€™s last baby. The couple announced in February that they were pregnant again. The news came 7 months after they welcomed their son Rio John in June 2023. Peta shared that shelearned she was pregnant 4 months post-partum. The DWTS pros also have a 7-year-old son named Shai Aleksander.

Earlier this month, the couple celebrated their 7-year wedding anniversary. They tied the knot in July 2017. Peta shared a funny and heartfelt post on Instagram to commemorate the occasion writing, â€œI guess the 7th year itch didnâ€™t happen?? ğŸ¤·ğŸ¼â€â™€ï¸ haha! I â¤ï¸you @maksimc â€¦7 years married & 10 years together ğŸ¤¯ Thank you for flirting with me way back in 2012 and putting the moves on me to get us 3 children, a dog and a beautiful life.â€

Congratulations to Peta and Maks on the birth of their third son!
